explains: n. 蜥蜴；类蜥蜴爬行动物

sentences.en: Confident in its camouflage, being the same colour as the rocks, the lizard stands still when it feels danger.
sentences.cn: 蜥蜴对自己和石头颜色相同的保护色很自信，即便感觉危险也不动。

sentences.en: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.cn: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.en: Adding yolk to a little egg of the lizard was a recipe for a female.
sentences.cn: 往小蜥蜴卵中添加卵黄便孵出了雌性蜥蜴。
